column2: CASTLE BLACK - DAVOS’ CHAMBER DAVOS hears GHOST’s howling and exits, then peers across the courtyard and sees JON SNOW’s body
It’s the Lord Commander! DOLOROUS EDD and other Night’s Watchmen rush up behind DAVOS
Help me get him inside
CASTLE BLACK - ROOM DOLOROUS EDD wipes the table clean
Thorne did this
Does the wolf know you? DOLOROUS EDD looks at DAVOS over his shoulder and nods
We need all the help we can get
Ser Davos
I saw him in the flames, fighting at Winterfell
I can’t speak for the flames, but he’s gone
CASTLE BLACK - MESS HALL ALLISER THORNE sits at the high table among the other leaders of the Night’s Watch
You all know why you’re here
And Bowen Marsh and Othell Yarwyck and the other officers in this castle
You’re right! The shouting stops
We’ve committed treason, all of us
CASTLE BLACK - ROOM GHOST nudges JON SNOW’s hand and whimpers
He’ll have seen we didn’t come
I don’t care who’s sitting at the high table
We don’t have the numbers
We have a direwolf
It’s not enough
If you were planning to see tomorrow, you picked the wrong room
We need to fight, but we don’t need to die
Bolt the door
She was 11 the first time I saw her
WINTERFELL - ROOM MYRANDA’s body lies on a table
The kennelmaster’s daughter
Myranda wasn’t, though
Your pain will be paid for a thousand times over
This is good meat
WINTERFELL - HALLWAY RAMSAY is walking with ROOSE
Your command of the cavalry was impressive

column1: Do you know who struck the killing blow? RAMSAY
column2: No
A shame
I rebelled against the crown to arrange your marriage to Sansa Stark

column1: Do you think that burning wagons in the night and mowing down tired, outnumbered Baratheons is the same as facing a prepared and provisioned Lannister army? RAMSAY
column2: No
A reckoning will come
I have a team of men after them with some of my best hounds
I’m glad to hear it
We can’t stop
We have to cross here
I can’t
It’s the only way to throw off the hounds
But it’s too cold
I’ve seen what his hounds do to a person
NORTHERN WILDERNESS - WOODS THEON and SANSA are walking together
Over here
Sansa
Stay here
No, I won’t make it without you
You will
Liar
She broke her leg jumping from the ramparts
I can’t wait to see what parts Ramsay cuts off you this time
It’s a bloody woman
Lady Sansa, I offer my services once again
And I vow

column1: that you shall always have a place by my hearth and… PODRICK
column2: Meat and mead at my table
Meat and mead at my table
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER CERSEI is sitting in the dark by a table
Your Grace, I’m sorry to disturb you
RED KEEP - CERSEI’S CHAMBER JAIME is standing on the balcony, looking out
All I could think about when she died was what would happen to her now
I think about locking Myrcella in a crypt
I think about her beautiful little face starting to collapse
Shh, shh
I have to
She’s not suffering
She was good
I know
I thought if I could make something so good, so pure
Listen -- listen to me
No, I knew this would happen
You don’t believe that
Of course I do
Fuck prophecy
We’re going to take everything there is
“The Seven Hells brim with the souls of saintly men
I’d like to see my brother
Confess
Please
Confess
I am the queen and I demand to see my brother
Sinners don’t make commands
Septa Unella
Our other guests need you
There
Septa Unella can be overzealous at times
My brother, can you tell me how he is? HIGH SPARROW sits on a stool beside MARGAERY
It isn’t Ser Loras that brings me here
I have nothing to confess
You have started down the path
I always envied Oberyn
And men
And men
Oberyn was born to be an adventurer
The gods are not fools
The Princess Myrcella… TYENE produces a dagger from her boot and stabs AREO in the back, killing him
When was the last time you left this palace? You don’t know your own people
My son Trystane… ELLARIA scoffs
Your son is weak just like you
SUNSPEAR - TRYSTANE’S CHAMBER TRYSTANE is painting an eye on a stone
I told you I’m not hungry
We’re not here to feed you
We’re here to kill you
Her or me? TRYSTANE draws his blade and points it at NYMERIA
Good
Smart boy
You’re a greedy bitch, you know that? OBARA and NYMERIA exit
We’re never going to fix what’s wrong with this city from the top of an 800-foot pyramid
We’ll be fine
You walk like a rich person
It’s a good thing you’re not a boy anymore
For your baby
She thinks you want to eat her baby
His Valyrian is terrible
Mhysa means mother in Valyrian
I know what mhysa means
For the night is dark and full of terrors
The Lord of Light sent the Mother of Dragons to you, and those who love the darkness chased her away
Many of the former slaves feel that Daenerys has abandoned them
She did fly away on a dragon and not come back
Fear has brought Meereen to a standstill
The Sons of the Harpy planned their attack in the fighting pits very carefully, which means they take orders from someone
Well, we won’t be sailing to Westeros anytime soon
We’re on the right path, then
Perhaps she’s tired of being queen
She’s too smart to like it
Maybe she’s flown somewhere else, somewhere far away from men like us
I’ve been all over the world
There’s no escaping her, eh? You keep coming back
You know why
You’re a romantic
If you grow old
If I grow old
So do I
Dothraki? JORAH looks down and sees something in the grass
They have her
Maybe she saw a ghost
Pink people are afraid of the sun
I’ll ask Khal Moro for a night with you
Pretty eyes, but she’s an idiot
She doesn’t have to be smart to get fucked in the ass
I like to talk when I’m finished
ESSOS ARID LANDS - DOTHRAKI SETTLEMENT The Dothraki folk are tending to their affairs
For you, my Khal
Look at those lips, blood of my blood
Blue-eyed women are witches
It is known
Cut off her head, before she casts a spell on you
Even if I was blind, I’d hear my wives say, “Cut off her head” and I’d know this woman was beautiful
Conquering a city and taking her people as slaves, and taking her idols back to Vaes Dothrak
Breaking a wild horse, forcing it to submit to your will
Seeing a beautiful woman naked for the first time is among the five best things in life
Do not touch me

I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, the Unburnt, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar of the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons

column1: He places his hand on the back of DAENERYS’ head KHAL MORO
column2: You are nobody, the millionth of your name, Queen of Nothing, slave of Khal Moro
I will not lie with you
I told you she was a witch
I like her
I was wife of Khal Drogo, son of Khal Bharbo
Khal Drogo is dead
I know
Forgive me
If you will escort me back to Meereen, I will see that your khalasar is given a thousand horses, as a sign of my gratitude
When a Khal dies, there is only one place for his Khaleesi
Vaes Dothrak
To live out her days with the widows of dead Khals
Thank you
Are you listening, blind girl? Do you hear them talking? Do any of them talk to you? No
Stand and fight, blind girl
I can’t see
That’s your problem, not mine
See you tomorrow
Ser Davos, we have no cause to fight
Hear that, lads? Nothing to fear
I will grant amnesty to all brothers who thrown down their arms before nightfall
And some mutton
We’ll give you food
Thank you, Ser Alliser
Boys, I’ve been running from men like that ll my life

column1: In my learned opinion, we open that door -- NIGHT’S WATCHMAN #1
column2: And they’ll slaughter us all
They want to come in, they’re gonna come in
Aye, but we don’t need to make it easy for them
Edd is our only chance
It’s a sad fucking statement if Dolorous Edd is our only chance
There’s always the Red Woman
CASTLE BLACK - MELISANDRE’S CHAMBER MELISANDRE is sitting at the edge of her bed by a fire
At Castle Black, Thorne defends his treason while Edd and Davos defend themselves
